hero.title: Shalom Gospel Church
hero.verse: And I tell you that you are Peter and on this rock I will build my church, and the gates of Hades will not overcome it.

journey.title: Our Journey
journey.verse: And I tell you that you are Peter and on this rock I will build my church, and the gates of Hades will not overcome it.
journey.content1: At the beginning of year 2005 we began a small group prayer in home, and it made the pathway to our present Shalom church. During our prayers a sister who lived in the home had special prayer request regarding a church for us. God has kept this burden in her heart. As we prayed for it God answered our prayers and gave us a church in Milano city. Throughout these years God has done great and mighty things in our church.
journey.verse2: The Lord's hand was with them, and a great number of people believed and turned to the Lord.
journey.closing: All glory, honor and praise be to our God forever!

footer.about: A faith community building God's kingdom in Milan and Verona since 2005.
footer.description: Sinhala Christian Evangelical Church in Italy
